import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Main, MainNavigation } from 'modules/Main' import { ProfileForm } from '../ProfileForm/ProfileForm' import cls from './ProfilePage.module.css' import { Button } from 'UI/Button/Button' import { AddImageIcon } from 'UI/AddImageIcon/AddImageIcon' import { CustomLink } from 'UI/CustomLink/CustomLink' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { PopupNames, PopupsSlice } from 'redux/PopupsSlice/PopupsSlice' export const ProfilePage = () => { const {isAuthenticate} = useSelector(state=>state.user) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(()=>{ if(!isAuthenticate){ dispatch(PopupsSlice.actions.showPopup(PopupNames.SIGNIN)) } }, []) return (
